title: Conduct a Supplier Performance Review
description: A category manager needs to pull performance data for a key supplier for a quarterly business review.

tasks.description: Select the supplier and the date range for the review.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent selects the correct supplier and the previous quarter.

tasks.description: Retrieve key performance indicators (KPIs) such as on-time delivery, quality acceptance rate, and cost variance.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a report showing 95% on-time delivery, 99.5% quality rate, and +1% cost variance.

tasks.description: Compile the data into a standardized performance scorecard.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent populates the QBR scorecard template with the retrieved data.
